LanguageData.Melee_3HST_ECSBlade.label: ECS blade
LanguageData.Melee_3HST_ECSBlade.description: An energy saber using a shard of ECS shield force field as it's cutting edge. Sharper than mono blade and swifter than a feather, it deals less damage than it and is really fragile.
LanguageData.Melee_3HST_ECSBlade.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.Melee_3HST_ECSBlade.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.Melee_3HST_ECSBlade.tools.2.label: edge
